role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: Ansible role that installs everything needed to use Snap on Linux
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that will install [Snap](https://snapcraft.io/) on Linux machines. Snap is a software packaging and deployment system developed by [Canonical](https://canonical.com/) for operating systems that use the Linux kernel.
